markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Boots of Speed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=414)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These sleek red boots make your legs feel like they’re bursting with energy. You gain a +5-foot item bonus to your land Speed and to any climb or swim Speeds you have.

<document level="2" id="action-237" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Boots of Speed
